docs.abstract: Italy is establishing refugee holding centers and search-and-rescue programs due to skyrocketing migration crisis in the Mediterranean; roughly 120,00 migrants were rescued by Italian ships in 2014, almost triple the figure in 2013, while nearly 2,800 have died in shipwrecks or in transit, a fourfold increase; rescuers are now searching waters near Malta after reports that more than 750 people may have died in two shipwrecks.
